cutting.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a stem or leaf that is cut from a plant and put in soil or water to grow into a new plant
cutting.translation[0].definitions[1].de: an article that has been cut from a newspaper or magazine
cutting.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Margot sent him some press cuttings about the wedding.
cutting.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a passage that has been dug through high ground for a railway, road etc
cutting.translation[1].definitions[0].de: unkind and intended to upset someone
